p: The title compound was obtained in 51% yield from compound 31a following the general procedure for reductive amination: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 3.91 (s, 3H), 4.62 (d, J = 6.0 Hz, 2H), 6.54 (d, J = 7.5 Hz, 1H), 6.63 (t, J = 5.4 Hz, 1H), 6.98 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 1H), 7.32 (t, J = 7.8 Hz, 1H), 7.48 (d, J = 8.1 Hz, 2H), 8.00 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 2H), 8.04 (d, J = 2.4 Hz, 1H), 8.62 (d, J = 2.4 Hz, 1H); 13 C NMR (75 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 47.4, 52.2, 105.7, 113.7, 127.1, 129.2, 129.3, 130.1, 134.2, 136.1, 144.4, 144.5, 146.1, 167.0.
